Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 9
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty IX; sheet 8 (twenty fragments); Hieratic ritual text recto and verso. Recto 15-17, Verso 1-3. Recto: The Ritual of Amenophis I Verso: Conclusion of the Ritual. A Book of Invocations. A Book of Protection.
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri Vol. 1 pp. 78-113, Vol. 2 Plate 56, Recto 14-17; Plate 57, Verso 1-2; Plate 58, Verso 3.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57068) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57068)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, bloom, fractured, loss Black ink Red ink Tabbed: silk Tabbed: court plaster Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (warped) Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
